attributes.action: Stop the Development on The Botley Park Hotel Golf Course
attributes.additional_details: Whilst most residents in Boorley Green/Botley are in favour of sustainable development; we do not want to see this at the cost of Greenfield Sites, in particular a site as scenic as the Botley Park Golf Course with its natural undulating beauty set in 176 acres of beautiful Hampshire countryside.  The wildlife and fauna and flora are amazing and should be appreciated by everyone.
